description: The International System of Units (SI) maintains standard weights and measures.
title: SiSystemOfUnits

nameOfStandardizationBody.description: The inter-governmental organization through which Member States act together on matters related to measurement science and measurement standards.
nameOfStandardizationBody.title: SiSystemOfUnits.nameOfStandardizationBody Schema

nameOfSystem.description: A system of physical units (SI Units) based on the meter, kilogram, second, ampere, kelvin, candela, and mole, together with a set of prefixes to indicate multiplication or division by a power of ten.
nameOfSystem.title: SiSystemOfUnits.nameOfSystem Schema
